title: # 338 - Josh Adam Meyers & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Josh Adam Meyers to talk about starting the Goddamn Comedy Jam, inheriting money and going to Europe for 7 months, drugs, music, Angelo Bowers, and much more!

Check out Josh's Podcast "The 500" on iTunes!

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $10 go to www.forhims.com/bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get 15% off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast and use the promo code "Bertcast"

This episode is also brought to you by Calm. Get 25% off of a Calm premium subscription by going to www.calm.com/bert

This episode is also brought to you by Brooklinen. Get 10% off your first order and free shipping by going to www.brooklinen.com and use promo code "Bertcast"

This episode is also brought to you by Shipstation. Try free for 60 days by going to www.shipstation.com. Just click on the microphone at the top of the page and use the promo code "Bert"


To Follow me on..

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer
